details.title: An implemented view of systems engineering for systems of systems
details.abstract: This has presented a time-sequenced wave model representation of SoS SE that is usable by SoS SE practitioners in developing implementation approaches to their activities. It has identified information critical to decision-making in SoS evolution, noted the artifacts in which the information is normally contained, and where the information and artifacts are created, updated, and used in the wave model.
details.journal_title: IEEE Aerospace and Electronic Systems Magazine
